title: Smart Data Models - ExcELIN1
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Static PI transformer fed excitation system: ELIN (VATECH) - simplified model.  This model represents an all-static excitation system. A PI voltage controller establishes a desired field current set point for a proportional current controller. The integrator of the PI controller has a follow-up input to match its signal to the present field current.  A power system stabilizer with power input is included in the model.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcELIN1

dpnf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Controller follow up dead band (Dpnf).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

efmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum open circuit excitation voltage (Efmax).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

efmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum open circuit excitation voltage (Efmin).  Typical Value = -5. Default: 0.0

ks1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer Gain 1 (Ks1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

ks2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer Gain 2 (Ks2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

smax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer Limit Output (smax).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

tfi.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Current transducer time constant (Tfi).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tnu.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Controller reset time constant (Tnu).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

ts1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer Phase Lag Time Constant (Ts1).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

ts2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer Filter Time Constant (Ts2).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

tsw.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Stabilizer parameters (Tsw).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

vpi.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Current controller gain (Vpi).  Typical Value = 12.45. Default: 0.0

vpnf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Controller follow up gain (Vpnf).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

vpu.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage controller proportional gain (Vpu).  Typical Value = 34.5. Default: 0.0

xe.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation transformer effective reactance (Xe) (>=0).  Xe represents the regulation of the transformer/rectifier unit.  Typical Value = 0.06. Default: 0.0
